title: Lonely Level 19 Looking for friends
body: Hi, I'm level 19 looking for friends to play with. Please add me in game if you would like to play. I'm very lonely and none of my friends play league. Please stop me from being lonely. :(

replies.body:
Do u main amumu? Lol jking
Feel free to add me
Sure I'll add you... level 15 here and not that great a player... lolz

YOucan add mee

ill probably just spam taric in norms though hehe

Add me
I've been playing bout almost 3 years.
But im still bad xD
Feel free to add me. I just moved to OCE.

I will add you :)

Since your level 19 I'll send you a friend request under my bro's account since his is level 15 i think.

Good intentions, might want to rethink. 

Straight from TOS

>You may not share your Account with anyone other than as expressly set forth herein, and you are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials and for any and all activities

[*BOOP*](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse)
